title: Gerrard: No decision made on Coutinho's future
shortDescription: Aston Villa manager Steven Gerrard says no decision has been made on whether the club will try to sign Philippe Coutinho on a permanent contract this summer.

title: Messi or Ronaldo? Mbappe, Salah, Haaland? Who's the world's best?
shortDescription: As Lionel Messi and Cristiano Ronaldo's dominance begins to wane, who deserves the crown of world's best player?

title: Neville: Mbappe heir apparent to Ronaldo, Messi
shortDescription: Kylian Mbappe can crown himself successor to Cristiano Ronaldo and Lionel Messi as the world's best player before the end of 2022, says Gary Neville.

title: Slavia's Kudela won't be prosecuted over racism allegations
shortDescription: Slavia Prague defender Ondrej Kudela will not be prosecuted after being accused of racially abusing Rangers' Glen Kamara during a Europa League tie at Ibrox last March.

title: Greatest Goals: Harry Kane vs Thierry Henry
shortDescription: After Harry Kane moved above Thierry Henry on the Premier League all-time top scorers list, we've picked out some of their best goals.

title: PFA releases South Asian player data on AIMS anniversary
shortDescription: PFA data has revealed there are 115 players from British South Asian backgrounds out of almost 15,000 players in academy and professional football.

title: Papers: Toon want Rudiger, City lead Haaland race
shortDescription: All the top stories and transfer rumours from Tuesday's national newspapers...

title: Liverpool through despite Inter loss | Salah: 'Maybe we were overconfident'
shortDescription: Liverpool are through to the quarter-finals of the Champions League with a 2-1 aggregate win despite being beaten 1-0 on the night by 10-man Inter at Anfield.

title: Champions League: Zinchenko in line for start | Mbappe passed fit by Poch
shortDescription: The Champions League last 16 continues as Wednesday as Manchester City host Sporting CP and PSG take a 1-0 lead over Real Madrid to the Bernabeu.

title: Papa John's Trophy: Will Rotherham or Hartlepool meet Sutton in final?
shortDescription: As the 2021/22 Papa John's Trophy reaches its latter stages, we bring you the state of play, upcoming fixtures and the schedule for the remainder of the tournament.

title: Klopp: Sanchez lucky to be on pitch by time of red card
shortDescription: Jurgen Klopp said Alexis Sanchez was lucky to be on the pitch when he received his second-half red card as Liverpool saw off Inter to progress in the Champions League.

title: Sutton beat Wigan in shootout to reach Papa John's Trophy final
shortDescription: Goalkeeper Dean Bouzanis was the hero as Sutton beat Wigan 7-6 on penalties to advance to the Papa John's Trophy final in their maiden season in the competition.

title: EFL highlights, round-up: Fulham, Sheff Utd win; Bournemouth held
shortDescription: Fulham thump 10-man Swansea 5-1, Bournemouth up to second but held by Peterborough and Sheff Utd beat Middlesbrough 4-1. MK Dons win again in League One.

title: Luton beat Coventry to move back into sixth
shortDescription: Elijah Adebayo's first-half strike sent Luton back into the Sky Bet Championship play-off places as the Hatters earned a 1-0 victory over Coventry at the CBS Arena.

title: Fulham charge continues as they thump 10-man Swans
shortDescription: Fulham moved another step closer to a return to the Premier League as they hammered home five goals against 10-man Swansea.

title: Goal-shy Blackburn held by Millwall
shortDescription: Blackburn's woes in front of goal continued as they could only draw 0-0 with Millwall.

title: Sheff Utd thump Boro on Wilder's return
shortDescription: Chris Wilder suffered a miserable return to Bramall Lane as Sheffield United swept aside Middlesbrough 4-1 to maintain their promotion challenge.

title: Bournemouth held by Posh but back up to second
shortDescription: Jack Marriott's fourth goal of the season helped Peterborough earn a rare away point as the bottom club put another dent in Bournemouth's promotion hopes with a 1-1 draw.

title: Stoke strike late to deny Barnsley precious win
shortDescription: An equaliser from Lewis Baker deep into stoppage time snatched a point for Stoke in a 1-1 draw against Barnsley.

title: Lewandowski makes history as Bayern thrash Salzburg
shortDescription: Robert Lewandowski scored the earliest hat-trick in Champions League history as Bayern Munich destroyed Red Bull Salzburg 7-1 to reach the last eight of the competition.
